abstract: Curtis Smith, who was arrested in March for jumping wall at the White House, is fatally shot in Pennsylvania after attacking a Chester County Courthouse deputy sheriff and slashing him with a knife.
lead_paragraph: A man arrested after jumping a wall at the White House was fatally shot Tuesday after he attacked a deputy sheriff at the Chester County Courthouse, the authorities said.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Man Killed After Attacking Was a White House Wall Jumper
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Man Killed After Attack on Deputy Was a White House Wall Jumper

snippet: A man arrested after jumping a wall at the White House was fatally shot Tuesday after he attacked a deputy sheriff at the Chester County Courthouse, the authorities said.
